title: Yu Yu Hakusho Movies (1-2) English Dubbed-soagg
description:
Yu Yu Hakusho Movies 1 and 2 English Dubbed 

Outline:
Yu Yu Hakusho: The Movie
Resolution: 720 x 512
Runtime: 25:40
Size: 250 MB
Koenma is kidnapped by two demons known as Garuga and Koashura. They demand a ransom for his release. What the demons want, the Golden Seal. It is said that whoever has the seal is considered the ruler of Spirit World. It's up to Yusuke, along with his friends, to stop them

Yu Yu Hakusho: Poltergeist Report
Resolution: 720 x 416
Runtime: 1:34:15
Size: 700 MB
Spirit World is under water after an abnormally powerful tsunami hits. Koenma gives Botan a strange item to give to Yusuke. However, she is badly injured during her trip from Spirit World to Human World, and is unable to tell Yusuke something very important. Meanwhile, a great evil is beginning to rise, and a new world is revealed, the Netherworld. Spirit World is now flooded, and Yusuke and the crew must find the five elemental sites to restore Spirit World. There are some powerful opponents standing in their way, however. As Yusuke must fight the king of the Netherworld, Hiei must battle with a god who also has a Jagan eye, Kurama must confront someone from his past, and Kuwabara has to defeat a god who can copy his every move. The fight to save Spirit World begins...
